resources.string: 1. Go to Xposed Manager and enable the module\n 2 If you updated the app, toggle the checkbox twice\n 3. Reboot your phone
Android7+ relies on coordinate tapping, your device hasn't enabled accessibility service with coordinate tapping support (but you can enable it). Do you want to enable it anyway?
Android7+ (with coordinate tapping support) is required. Your device doesn't support coordinate tapping at the moment.
Sync failed, root privilege must be granted~
Sync failed, storage permission must be granted~
Sync failed, check if root privilege is granted~
Replace failed, manually delete files and replace again~
Replace failed, grant storage permission and replace again~
Undo failed, if this persists, undo each app manually~
Failed. If this persists, please email me~
Replace is disabled, you may enable it in Replace Rules page…

1.Files are modified, unknown issues may occur (keep a fresh backup);
2.Files can be locked from editing;
3.After executing top right menu -> replace, it'll come into effect;
4.Use with care, no guarantee it always works;
5.If replace failed, you may delete the file manually, and try again;

1.Files are modified, unknown issues may occur;
2.Only directories can be replaced;
3.Batch execution is supported via top right menu;
4.If files are recovered by apps, you may enable auto detection;
If you have undone files, it's advisable to clear rules.
Are you sure you want to enable and replace ad files?
Are you sure you want to disable and undo ad files?
Are you sure you want to clear the rules?
Are you sure you want to clear local hosts? It'll not affect system hosts
Replace directories with files (only for empty directories at:1)
Zhihu doesn't support Xposed by default, you may create an empty file (/sdcard/zhihu/.allowXposed) to allow it, storage permission is required, do you want to create it?
Grant storage permission, save device ID to file, so you don't have to be licensed again once you uninstall Ad wars.
Grant storage permission, set ad directories as files (internal storage /miad directories).
Jump or replace need an app main activity, it's currently unset…
Directories to be replaced are empty…
It's a root directory, you can't replace it…
Replace file is disabled now, rules are hidden
Activation code doesn't limit number of devices:\n You may activate with it again once old activation is revoked.
There is no ViewId or coordinate, Wukong only support tapping ViewId or coordinate.\n ViewId has better compatibility, coordinate only works on this device.
1. Monitor auto skips in 9 seconds\n 2. If "跳过/Skip" is encountered, it'll be tapped on automatically\n 3. The ad activities added in rules won't be processed

By default, tapping will be done in 9 seconds after an app is opened.\n For ads that appear during using the app (such as ads appearing in the end of video), continuous monitoring is required. It'll be done according to tapping times, set this value according to your need.
If ad files are found to be modified by app, it'll be replaced automatically. This is based on accessibility.

By default, location of last search will be remembered, if rule stops working, a reset to 0 might be needed;
 Read data of this specific depth can enhance efficiency and lower memory footprint
 To read custom depth:
 Snapshot -> tap on a button -> check layout -> first depth is root node (-1) -> next depth is like 0/1/2… .
